document.full_text: private equity firm tpg capital  is selling a 4.5 percent stake in itself to two sovereign wealth funds, the kuwait investment authority and the government of singapore investment corp, a source familiar with the situation said on friday.
document.title: tpg sells 4.5 percent stake to sovereign funds: source
lines_and_colors: private equity firm tpg capital  is selling a 4.5 percent stake in itself to two sovereign wealth funds, the kuwait investment authority and the government of singapore investment corp, a source familiar with the situation said on friday.
